meanings.sent1: My homie and I always have each other's backs.
meanings.sent2: I'm meeting up with my homie for lunch later.
meanings.sent3: My homie and I are like two peas in a pod.
meanings.sent4: She's not just a homie, she's family to me.
meanings.sent5: I can always count on my homie to cheer me up when I'm feeling down.

meanings.definition: A person from one's neighborhood or community.
meanings.sent1: My homie from down the block helped me fix my bike.
meanings.sent2: I ran into an old homie from the neighborhood at the store.
meanings.sent3: Every homie in our community knows each other's business.
meanings.sent4: The homies in our neighborhood stick together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: Growing up, my homies and I used to play basketball at the park every weekend.
